name: 幻想水滸伝 紡がれし百年の時 Original Soundtrack & Drama CD
summary:
Also included with the game in various packs.


1.01 Composition, Vocals, & Lyrics: Chiaki Ishikawa
* The game credits arrangement to Chiaki Ishikawa, but the digital single credits arrangement to Masala Nishid.

BGM Composition (from iTunes):
    SOLIDTUNE (Seiichi Takamoto): 1.02, 1.04~8, 1.10~21, 2.01~17
    Miki Higashino: 1.03, 1.09

Drama cast:
    主人公 (CV: Hiroshi Kamiya)
    ミュラ (CV: Marina Inoue)
    トルワド (CV: Daisuke Ono)
    ロルフ (CV: Koji Yusa)
info:
• 版本特性: Original Soundtrack, Drama
  • 发售日期: 2012-02-09
  • 价格: 4200 JPY
  • 碟片数量: 3
